# Network Rule Set Submodule

This submodule creates a network rule set for an Azure Relay namespace.

## Usage

```hcl
module "network_rule_set" {
  source = "./modules/network-rule-set"

  relay_namespace_id             = azapi_resource.relay_namespace.id
  default_action                 = "Deny"
  public_network_access          = "Enabled"
  trusted_service_access_enabled = true
  ip_rules = [
    {
      ipMask = "10.0.0.0/24"
      action = "Allow"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- markdownlint-disable MD033 -->
## Requirements

The following requirements are needed by this module:

- <a name="requirement_terraform"></a> [terraform](#requirement\_terraform) (>= 1.9, < 2.0)

- <a name="requirement_azapi"></a> [azapi](#requirement\_azapi) (~> 2.4)

## Resources

The following resources are used by this module:

- [azapi_update_resource.network_rule_set](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/Azure/azapi/latest/docs/resources/update_resource) (resource)

<!-- markdownlint-disable MD013 -->
## Required Inputs

The following input variables are required:

### <a name="input_relay_namespace_id"></a> [relay\_namespace\_id](#input\_relay\_namespace\_id)

Description: The resource ID of the parent Relay namespace.

Type: `string`

## Optional Inputs

The following input variables are optional (have default values):

### <a name="input_avm_azapi_header"></a> [avm\_azapi\_header](#input\_avm\_azapi\_header)

Description: The AVM AzAPI header value to use for telemetry.

Type: `string`

Default: `""`

### <a name="input_default_action"></a> [default\_action](#input\_default\_action)

Description: The default action when no rule matches. Possible values are 'Allow' or 'Deny'.

Type: `string`

Default: `"Allow"`

### <a name="input_enable_telemetry"></a> [enable\_telemetry](#input\_enable\_telemetry)

Description: Controls whether telemetry is enabled for the submodule.

Type: `bool`

Default: `false`

### <a name="input_ip_rules"></a> [ip\_rules](#input\_ip\_rules)

Description: List of IP rules. Each rule must contain an ipMask and optionally an action (default: Allow).

Type:

```hcl
list(object({
    ipMask = string
    action = optional(string, "Allow")
  }))
```

Default: `[]`

### <a name="input_public_network_access"></a> [public\_network\_access](#input\_public\_network\_access)

Description: Public network access for the namespace. Possible values are 'Enabled', 'Disabled', or 'SecuredByPerimeter'.

Type: `string`

Default: `"Enabled"`

### <a name="input_trusted_service_access_enabled"></a> [trusted\_service\_access\_enabled](#input\_trusted\_service\_access\_enabled)

Description: Whether to enable trusted Azure service access.

Type: `bool`

Default: `false`

## Outputs

The following outputs are exported:

### <a name="output_name"></a> [name](#output\_name)

Description: The name of the network rule set.

### <a name="output_resource"></a> [resource](#output\_resource)

Description: The full resource object of the network rule set.

### <a name="output_resource_id"></a> [resource\_id](#output\_resource\_id)

Description: The resource ID of the network rule set.

## Modules

No modules.
